name: 1 Verify the login API, whether able to login
scenarioId: EcommerceAPI/EndtoEnd_E_commerce:1 Verify the login API, whether able to login
methodName: 1 Verify the login API, whether able to login

testSteps.description:
Given add headers to the API with below details:
| Content-Type |
| application/json |

When user calls "LoginUser" API with "POST" request:
| userEmail | password |
| postman55@gmail.com | Naidu@117 |

Then validate the status "200" with below details:
| message | userId | token |
| Login Successfully | NotNull# | NotNull# |

userStory.storyName: End to End E-commerce API validation
userStory.displayName: End to End E-commerce API validation
userStory.narrative: Verify the user can able to create a product and order as well as able to delete order and product.
